page.title: 13ROMFORD TO SOUTHEND A127
page.content: The A127 is one of the busiest 'A' roads in Britain.It is the main link between London and a number of important residential and industrial areas -Basildon New Town,Shell Haven Refinery,Ford Motor Company,and the seaside and airport town of Southend. From Gallows Corner on through Romford the road becomes particularly busy,as the traffic from North Essex on the A12 joins the already heavy stream of cars and lorries. At the heaviest time of the day between 5.30 and 6.30 p.m.some 6,000 cars and lorries passed under the footbridge joining Pettits Lane,North and South on their hot summers journey towards Southend,(5th June 1985).
